Title: 39278 - # Ways Preventative Maintenance on HVAC Units Saves Money
Direction: 500 words. Write about 3 to 6 ways a homeowner saves money through preventive maintenance on their HVAC units. Homeowners aren't always thinking about the condition of their HVAC units. They turn a switch and the AC or heat comes on. Sometimes, it doesn't at all, leaving the home too hot or cool. Talk about things such as how air quality equals healthy residents and fewer medical bills. Consider anchoring the URL to a sentence that discusses having a service contract for maintenance and taking advantage of it to save on the cost of repairs and replacements. Appeal to homeowners who aren't putting a lot of thought into the maintenance of their HVAC units because life is hectic. The placement site targets moms, so keep this in mind. Please link to this blog post as your target URL, not the client’s homepage: http://www.joplins.net/blog/what-should-your-contractor-check-during-routine-ac-maintenance
